extendedInfo.description: Featured on the homepage of the Android Market for phones & tablets, SkyGrid is a beautiful and captivating way to stay up to date on your news. Follow all the sources and topics you want, and effortlessly receive updates on the interests you care about. Read your favorite news, people, blogs, and topics in a customized Photo Gridâ¢.       â¨âââââ 80%+ 4 & 5 Star Market Rating â¨âââââ Featured on the homepage of the Android Market for phones & tabletsâââââ The most beautiful, powerful, and easy to use app to follow all of your sources & topicsâ¨â¨Reviews â¨â¨âThe apps I relied on during Hurricane Irene were Facebook, Gmail, and SkyGridâ NYTimesâGet the latest updates, news, and videos about all-things Gaga in SkyGrid!â Lady GagaâSkyGrid I like. SkyGrid is the news app that tells you whatâs happeningâ Jimmy Fallonâ¨"There's a fun app called SkyGrid. It's very interesting and simple!" Leo Laporte â¨âSkyGrid brings realtime news to Android phones and tablets â TechCrunch â¨â¨Key Features â¨â¨â The Beautiful Photo Gridâ¢. The trademark Photo Grid delivers a new, beautiful, and fun way to stay up to date on the news you care about.â Great Design. Be captivated by a fluid stream of vibrant, high-resolution, and sharp images telling the stories happening around the world.â Custom Android Design. Custom design for both Android phones & tablets.â Follow Your Sources. ESPN, Discovery, CNN and hundreds of other sources â all available with a single tap! â¨â Follow Your Topics. Any interest you can imagine you can follow â sports teams, celebs, politics, news, your company, anything â with a single tap!â Simple Sharing. A single quick tap lets you share with Facebook, Twitter, and Email.â Alerts & Notifications. Get alerts & badges custom tailored to your interests.â Featured News. Open your SkyGrid and see the most important events happening around the world, right now!â Powerful Following Technology. SkyGrid streams updates, news, and videos from over 1M sources on the Web (mainstream news, social sites, blogs etc). SkyGridâs patented algorithm âInformation Velocityâ then filters and updates you in real-time on the interests you follow and the fastest spreading events around the world!

reviews.title: Multitude of News Feeds
reviews.comment: Enjoy the ability to quickly view various News & Sports feeds in one quick and easy application. Would be lost without it.
reviews.author: John Snyder

reviews.title: Best way to read news
reviews.comment: Had to give it 5 stars love it n my HTC one X. Smooth interface. Not much more to say other than the android version is just as smooth as the ios version. All depends on your device.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use.
reviews.comment: Very smooth and organized. Great looking app. Nice widget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its NOT working!! Ugh
reviews.comment: its not even working on my new phone!! I switched from IPhone to galaxy Nexus and This app keeps crashing before I get a chance to read any news!!!! And this was my absolute  favorite app so this is really sad for me!!! :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app !!!
reviews.comment: I love it News best app have everything I feeling very happy National, International Global Wooww 10 stars thanks :-) \342\231\245
reviews.author: Rosa Evans

reviews.title: Runs in background and sucks up your battery
reviews.comment: Uninstall! 7% of battery consumption when I did not even launch it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Skygrid
reviews.comment: This is a wonderful. It keeps you current on the news YOU want to know and its free. You cant beat that!
reviews.author: Brandon Smalls

reviews.title: Resets/ force closes
reviews.comment: Every week it loses all my favorite stories. SGS2. It resets to default and I loose all my favorites. Was good 4 months ago. Now force closes every time wtf
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty cool ap
reviews.comment: Liked it on my ipad. Now it let\'s my phone do the ipad \"mini\" thing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My favorite news app.
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t save my favorites. Its a pain adding my favs over and over. Please fix!
reviews.author: Eric Velazquez

reviews.title: Momw2
reviews.comment: Love this app, able to follow very specific news topics, finally! Xoxo
reviews.author: Dalia Herbert

reviews.title: Following keywords is great
reviews.comment: The only one I found where I can do custom search for things the interest me. Certainly an essential app to have. The only problem is that sometimes it loses all of them...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I do like the layout on my ipad better. But this my favorite news app
reviews.author: Thom Wells

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: I gave 2 stars because there is a lot ofnewson here. But when I click view more for a news report it loads a different report tham the one I clicked. Please fix for five stars -bionic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A glorify rss reader
reviews.comment: It keeps bugging you with notifications which you can\'t disable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unique and useful app but...
reviews.comment: One of the better news aggregation apps.  I would give it 5 stars if only they would fix the fav forgets and force close issues.  The same issues have happened on my old HTC EVO and  EVO 3d, new One X, as well as my Asus Transformer Prime.  Please fix this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can be far better
reviews.comment: I was a apple user, this app looks like  half done, are you guys planning on improvising it or not?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: If I want to get updates on anyone from any blog site..I can and as soon as that post stuff too!.. thank you sky grid :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S2
reviews.comment: Not reliable...keep crashing all the times..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BAD App, It...
reviews.comment: This application refuses to save my favorites for any extended period.  I am getting fed up adding them back all the time.  Would be good otherwise
reviews.author: A Google User
